name: Mafia II - The Betrayal of Jimmy
name_original: Mafia II - The Betrayal of Jimmy
description: The Betrayal of Jimmy is set in an alternate timeline of 1950's Empire Bay. It follows the exploits of its protagonist Jimmy, a tough and rugged gun for hire who works alone and will do any job for a price. He likes his cars fast, his guns lethal, and usually leaves piles of bodies in his wake.
